articles.description: Alison Wood thought former boxer Umit Sucu was the man of her dreams - but she says her conned her by claiming his mum needed cash for cancer treatment. The woman says the total handed over was £35,000
articles.content:
A duped mum says she was fleeced of £35,000 by a romeo who was dubbed the Turkish warrior.
Alison Wood, 51, thought former boxer Umit Sucu was the man of her dreams.
